description: Get me the URI for the album The Colour And The Shape
code: search_results = sp.search(q='The Colour And The Shape', type='album')\nuri = search_results['albums']['items'][0].get('uri')\nreturn uri

description: Play the latest album by Taylor Swift
code:
search_results = sp.search(q='Taylor Swift', type='artist')
artist_uri = search_results['artists']['items'][0].get('uri')
albums = sp.artist_albums(artist_uri, album_type='album')
latest_album_uri = albums['items'][0].get('uri')
return latest_album_uri

description: Recommend songs similar to 'Shape of You'
code:
track_results = sp.search(q='Shape of You', type='track')
track_uri = track_results['tracks']['items'][0].get('uri')
recommendations = sp.recommendations(seed_tracks=[track_uri])
recommended_tracks = [track['uri'] for track in recommendations['tracks']]
return recommended_tracks
